str.name: Contact verification in the Central registry

strings.str: Contact verification in the central registry

str.name: For full activation of the following account

strings.str: thank you for your interest in verifying central registry contact with details below:
You have successfully finished the first step of contact verification. Last step is verification of your postal address.
you will need this PIN3 code:

str.name: To complete full activation of your account, go to

strings.str: which has to be entered into the form at this site:
After successfully submitting the form with PIN3 code, verification of your contact in the Central registry will be completed.

str.name: log into your contact profile and enter the code PIN3 at the initial screen.

strings.str: and enter PIN3 into the appropriate field.
